body:
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/test/e2e_node/lifecycle_hook_test.go

The prestop and poststart exec tests volume mount /tmp from the host and attempt to create a file there from inside the pod.  This is blocked by selinux.

@derekwaynecarr 

Failure:
```
• Failure [113.371 seconds]
[k8s.io] Container Lifecycle Hook
/root/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/framework/framework.go:650
  when create a pod with lifecycle hook
  /root/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e_node/lifecycle_hook_test.go:207
    when it is exec hook
    /root/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e_node/lifecycle_hook_test.go:108
      should execute prestop exec hook properly [Conformance] [It]
      /root/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e_node/lifecycle_hook_test.go:107

      wait for pod "pod-check-hook" to success
      Expected success, but got an error:
          <*errors.errorString | 0xc420176c20>: {
              s: "gave up waiting for pod 'pod-check-hook' to be 'success or failure' after 30s",
          }
          gave up waiting for pod 'pod-check-hook' to be 'success or failure' after 30s

      /root/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/framework/pods.go:202
```

kubelet.log
```
Mar 10 12:31:43 e2e-node.local.variantweb.net kubelet[17699]: E0310 12:31:43.102039   17699 kuberuntime_manager.go:715] container start failed: PostStart handler: command 'touch /tmp/test-bb4605dc-05bf-11e7-b9e8-fa163ed05e7a' exited with 1: touch: /tmp/test-bb4605dc-05bf-11e7-b9e8-fa163ed05e7a: Permission denied
Mar 10 12:31:43 e2e-node.local.variantweb.net kubelet[17699]: E0310 12:31:43.102095   17699 pod_workers.go:182] Error syncing pod bb464469-05bf-11e7-99f7-fa163ed05e7a ("pod-with-poststart-exec-hook_e2e-tests-container-lifecycle-hook-mrsxp(bb464469-05bf-11e7-99f7-fa163ed05e7a)"), skipping: failed to "StartContainer" for "pod-with-poststart-exec-hook" with PostStart handler: command 'touch /tmp/test-bb4605dc-05bf-11e7-b9e8-fa163ed05e7a' exited with 1: touch: /tmp/test-bb4605dc-05bf-11e7-b9e8-fa163ed05e7a: Permission denied
```

audit.log
```
type=AVC msg=audit(1489170676.162:8443): avc:  denied  { write } for  pid=18158 comm="touch" name="tmp" dev="vda1" ino=16818305 scontext=system_u:system_r:svirt_lxc_net_t:s0:c503,c666 tcontext=system_u:object_r:tmp_t:s0 tclass=dir
type=SYSCALL msg=audit(1489170676.162:8443): arch=c000003e syscall=2 success=no exit=-13 a0=7ffef820be37 a1=42 a2=1b6 a3=700230 items=0 ppid=18145 pid=18158 auid=4294967295 uid=0 gid=0 euid=0 suid=0 fsuid=0 egid=0 sgid=0 fsgid=0 tty=(none) ses=4294967295 comm="touch" exe="/bin/touch" subj=system_u:system_r:svirt_lxc_net_t:s0:c503,c666 key=(null)
```
title: tests: e2e-node: container lifecycle hook exec tests don't work with selinux
